Text: He used the money to help buy a house for his daughter. Now, 229 members of the pension schemes are concerned they may not see their money again.
Cause: He used the money to help buy a house for his daughter.
Effect: Now, 229 members of the pension schemes are concerned they may not see their money again.
Sentence: <e1>He used the money to help buy a house for his daughter.</e1> <e2>Now, 229 members of the pension schemes are concerned they may not see their money again.</e2>
